title: Do you recycle? Tell me about your recycling habits.

korean: 한국은 분리수거가 의무라서 안 할 수가 없어.
집에 분리수거 쓰레기통을 여러 개 두고 있어.
플라스틱, 종이, 캔, 유리 이렇게 구분해서 버려.
특히 플라스틱은 라벨 떼고 깨끗이 씻어서 버려야 해.
일주일에 두 번 정해진 날에 배출해.
텀블러도 들고 다니고, 장볼 때 에코백 써.
환경 보호를 위해서 작은 실천이 중요하다고 생각해.
english: I'm the type who recycles diligently.
In Korea, recycling is mandatory, so you can't not do it.
I have several recycling bins at home.
I separate and throw away plastic, paper, cans, and glass.
Especially for plastic, I have to remove labels and wash them clean before throwing away.
At first it was bothersome, but now it's become a habit.
I also collect and throw away food waste separately.
I put it out on designated days twice a week.
These days, I'm trying to reduce the use of disposable items.
I also carry a tumbler and use an eco-bag when shopping.
I think small actions are important for environmental protection.
I want to continue practicing well in the future.
